FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: Hi, I'm Amber! I am CEO of Fun around here.

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: Hi! I'm Kitty! I'm new. I just moved in from Idaho.

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: Great! You will fit right in. We like to party!

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: It sounds like there is a fun party next door. Can we go?

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: Ahh, yeah, that's by invite-only. I am heading there, but you will need tickets.

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: Oooh, how do I get tickets?

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: I'll show you. Come to my room for a late-night dinner. Buy some flowers!
